verses.verse: A false <S%H4820><s%> balance <S%H3976><s%> is abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>: but a just <S%H8003><s%> weight <S%H68><s%> is his delight <S%H7522><s%>.
When pride <S%H2087><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, then cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> shame <S%H7036><s%>: but with the lowly <S%H6800><s%> <S%H8803><s%> is wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.

The integrity <S%H8538><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall guide <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them: but the perverseness <S%H5558><s%> of transgressors <S%H898><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall destroy <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them.

Riches <S%H1952><s%> profit <S%H3276><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not in the day <S%H3117><s%> of wrath <S%H5678><s%>: but righteousness <S%H6666><s%> delivereth <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>.

The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the perfect <S%H8549><s%> shall direct <S%H3474><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>: but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by his own wickedness <S%H7564><s%>.

The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them: but transgressors <S%H898><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall be taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in their own naughtiness <S%H1942><s%>.

When a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H120><s%> dieth <S%H4194><s%>, his expectation <S%H8615><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and the hope <S%H8431><s%> of unjust <S%H205><s%> men perisheth <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> is delivered out <S%H2502><s%> <S%H8738><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>, and the wicked <S%H7563><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his stead.

An hypocrite <S%H2611><s%> with his mouth <S%H6310><s%> destroyeth <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>: but through knowledge <S%H1847><s%> shall the just <S%H6662><s%> be delivered <S%H2502><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

When it goeth well <S%H2898><s%> with the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, the city <S%H7151><s%> rejoiceth <S%H5970><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and when the wicked <S%H7563><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, there is shouting <S%H7440><s%>.

By the b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> the city <S%H7176><s%> is exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: but it is overthrown <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8735><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

He that is void <S%H2638><s%> of wisdom <S%H3820><s%> despiseht <S%H936><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>: but a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding <S%H8394><s%> holdeth his peace <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

A talebearer <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H7400><s%> revealeth <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8764><s%> secrets <S%H5475><s%>: but he that is of a faithful <S%H539><s%> <S%H8738><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> concealeth <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the matter <S%H1697><s%>.

Where no counsel <S%H8458><s%> is, the people <S%H5971><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: but in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of counsellors <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8802><s%> there is safety <S%H8668><s%>.

He that is surety <S%H6148><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for a stranger <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> shall smart <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8735><s%> <S%H7451><s%> for it: and he that hateth <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> suretiship <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8802><s%> is sure <S%H982><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
A gracious <S%H2580><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> retaineth <S%H8551><s%> <S%H8799><s%> honour <S%H3519><s%>: and strong <S%H6184><s%> men retain <S%H8551><s%> <S%H8799><s%> riches <S%H6239><s%>.

The merciful <S%H2617><s%> man <S%H376><s%> doeth good <S%H1580><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to his own soul <S%H5315><s%>: but he that is cruel <S%H394><s%> troubleth <S%H5916><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his own flesh <S%H7607><s%>.

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> worketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a deceitful <S%H8267><s%> work <S%H6468><s%>: but to him that soweth <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8802><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> shall be a sure <S%H571><s%> reward <S%H7938><s%>.
As righteousness <S%H6666><s%> tendeth to life <S%H2416><s%>: so he that pursueth <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8764><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> pursueth it to his own death <S%H4194><s%>.

They that are of a froward <S%H6141><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> are abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>: but such as are upright <S%H8549><s%> in their way <S%H1870><s%> are his delight <S%H7522><s%>.

Though hand <S%H3027><s%> join in hand <S%H3027><s%>, the wicked <S%H7451><s%> shall not be unpunished <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: but the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be delivered <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

As a jewel <S%H5141><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> in a swine's <S%H2386><s%> snout <S%H639><s%>, so is a fair <S%H3303><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> which is without <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8802><s%> discretion <S%H2940><s%>.
The desire <S%H8378><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is only good <S%H2896><s%>: but the expectation <S%H8615><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is wrath <S%H5678><s%>.

There is <S%H3426><s%> that scattereth <S%H6340><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, and yet increaseht <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; and there is that withholdeth <S%H2820><s%> <S%H8802><s%> more than is meet <S%H3476><s%>, but it tendeth to poverty <S%H4270><s%>.
The liberal <S%H1293><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be made fat <S%H1878><s%> <S%H8792><s%>: and he that watereth <S%H7301><s%> <S%H8688><s%> shall be watered <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8686><s%> also himself.

He that withholdeth <S%H4513><s%> <S%H8802><s%> corn <S%H1250><s%>, the people <S%H3816><s%> shall curse <S%H5344><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him: but b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> shall be upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of him that selleth <S%H7666><s%> <S%H8688><s%> it.

He that diligently seeketh <S%H7836><s%> <S%H8802><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> procureth <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> favour <S%H7522><s%>: but he that seeketh <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8802><s%> mischief <S%H7451><s%>, it shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him.

He that trusteth <S%H982><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in his riches <S%H6239><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: but the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall flourish <S%H6524><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as a branch <S%H5929><s%>.

He that troubleth <S%H5916><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his own house <S%H1004><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%>: and the fool <S%H191><s%> shall be servant <S%H5650><s%> to the wise <S%H2450><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>.
The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>; and he that winneth <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8802><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%> is wise <S%H2450><s%>.
Behold, the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be recompensed <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8792><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>: much more the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and the sinner <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
